alert.note: Alert for Leon; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 1:27AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Robertson and southwestern Leon Counties through 200 AM CST... At 127 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Franklin, or 9 miles northeast of Hearne, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Twin Oak Reservoir, Camp Creek Lake, Lake Limestone, Hilltop Lakes, Normangee, Marquez, Seale, Easterly, New Baden, Bald Prairie, Wheelock, Flynn, Ridge and Robbins. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
